full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title and Reference Number
* **Title**: Facilitator Consultant
* **Reference Number**: cb-7365-14638140

#### Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000070215
* **Publication Date**: July 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 3, 2023, 16:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 21, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2028

#### Service Description
The Canadian Wildlife Service is seeking professional services of a facilitator consultant to be retained on an “as and when required” basis for the Western Region. The consultant will manage and execute required facilitation activities to support the Indigenous Advisory and Monitoring Committee.

The period of the contract will be for two years, with two (2) one (1)-year option periods, covering a total estimated level of effort of 1,105 hours.

#### Deliverables and Requirements
The consultant will be required to:

* Facilitate meetings and activities for the Committee
* Manage record-keeping and documentation
* Coordinate scheduling and accommodations for meetings
* Develop agendas and lead discussions
* Encourage participation and engagement among Committee members

#### Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* **Contact Person**: James Molinski
* **Email**: [james.molinski@ec.gc.ca](mailto:james.molinski@ec.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (819) 975-1856

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the term of reference and instructions to bidders, are available for download from [Canada Buy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7365/npp_5000070215_en.pdf) (English) and [France Buy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7365/npp_5000070215_fr.pdf) (French). The closing date for this tender is [August 3, 2023](https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?iso=20230803T160000&p1=264&am=16) (expired).
